trans-unit.source: Provides information about the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton" /> control to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton" /> 控件的相关信息提供给具有辅助功能的客户端应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Windows Forms has accessibility support built in and provides information about your application that allows it to work with accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Windows 窗体辅助功能内置了支持，并提供有关应用程序，它以使用辅助功能客户端应用程序的信息。

trans-unit.source: Examples of accessibility client applications are screen enlarger and reviewer utilities, voice input utilities, on-screen keyboards, alternative input devices, and keyboard enhancement utilities.
trans-unit.target: 辅助功能客户端应用程序的示例是屏幕放大器和查看器实用程序、 语音输入的实用工具、 屏幕键盘、 其他输入的设备，以及键盘增强实用工具。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.RadioButtonAccessibleObject> class inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> class to provide information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.RadioButtonAccessibleObject>类继承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject>类来提供以下信息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控件添加到辅助功能客户端应用程序。

trans-unit.source: There are instances when you will want to provide custom information, such as a control's name or description, to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: 当你将想要提供自定义的信息，例如控件的名称或描述，对辅助功能客户端应用时，有实例。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways of providing this information.
trans-unit.target: 有两种方法提供此信息。

trans-unit.source: To provide limited accessibility information for existing controls, set the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDescription%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDefaultActionDescription%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A> property values, which will be reported to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供有限的辅助功能信息供现有控件，设置控件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDescription%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDefaultActionDescription%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A>将报告给具有辅助功能客户端应用程序的属性值。

trans-unit.source: If you require more accessibility information to be included with your control, you can write your own class that is derived from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> classes.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要更多的辅助功能信息将包括您的控件，您可以编写您自己的类派生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject>类。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are writing your own control that is not derived from the common controls, or you require such operations as hit testing within your control, you should create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> for your control by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你正在编写您自己的控件不派生自公共控件，或需要在控件内的命中测试的此类操作，应创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject>通过调用控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton" /> that this object provides information for.
trans-unit.target: 此对象为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton" /> 提供通知信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.RadioButtonAccessibleObject" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.RadioButtonAccessibleObject" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the default action of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取描述 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton" /> 控件的默认操作的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A description of the default action of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton" /> 控件默认操作的说明。

trans-unit.source: Gets the role of this accessible object.
trans-unit.target: 获取此辅助性对象的角色。

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton" /> 控件的状态。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked" /> property is set to true, returns <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Checked" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked" /> 属性设置为 true，则返回 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Checked" />。
